input.sentences: we took the kids to the fair at the local church . first up was a painting class .
after the painting class the kids played in the bouncy house .
the kids were getting tired so we decided to get their faces painted .
then the kids spent some time at another booth talking to the people who were in charge .
the day ended with some lovely music .
output.sentences: She was painting with the local kids.
They played after painting with other kids.
Once tired, the parents painted faces for the kids.
They took time talking to the parents about the time they spent on vacation.
The music they played was a lovely addition to the day.
